competition_summary.context: Competition Our industry is highly competitive. We compete with manufacturers of Flash and HDD for Cloud, Client, and Consumer end markets. In Flash, we compete with vertically integrated suppliers such as Kioxia, Micron Technology, Inc., Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd., SK hynix, Inc., Yangtze Memory Technologies Co., Ltd. and numerous smaller companies that assemble flash into products. In HDD, we compete with Seagate Technology Holdings plc and Toshiba Electronic Devices & Storage Corporation.

In HDD, we compete with Seagate Technology Holdings plc and Toshiba Electronic Devices & Storage Corporation.
